speaker: Sophia
text: Did you catch what Liam reported during the stand-up this morning?
ipa: dɪdʒə kæʧ wʌt ˈliəm ɹɪˈpɔɹtɪd ˈdʊɹɪŋ ðə ˈstænd.ʌp ðɪs ˈmɔɹ.nɪŋ
stress: Did you CATCH what LIAM REPORTED during the STAND-UP this MORNING

speaker: Ethan
text: Not everything. What exactly did he say?
ipa: nɑt ˈɛvɹiˌθɪŋ | wʌt ɪɡˈzæktli dɪd i seɪ
stress: Not EVERYTHING | what EXACTLY did he SAY

speaker: Sophia
text: He stated that the server had crashed the night before due to a memory leak. He explained that they had already patched the issue temporarily.
ipa: hi ˈsteɪtɪd ðət ðə ˈsɝvɚ həd kræʃt ðə naɪt bɪˈfɔɹ du tə ə ˈmɛmɚi lik | hi ɪkˈspleɪnd ðət ðeɪ həd ɔlˈɹɛdi pæʧt ði ˈɪʃu ˌtɛmpəˈɹɛɹəli
stress: He STATED that the SERVER had CRASHED the NIGHT BEFORE due to a MEMORY LEAK | he EXPLAINED that they had ALREADY PATCHED the ISSUE TEMPORARILY
linking:
"had crashed" → /həd kræʃt/ (reduction)
"patched the" → /pæʧt ði/ (t to the)

speaker: Ethan
text: Did he say how it happened?
ipa: dɪd i seɪ haʊ ɪt ˈhæpənd
stress: Did he SAY how it HAPPENED

speaker: Sophia
text: Yeah, he claimed that a third-party library had caused unexpected behavior under high load. He warned that we should monitor the logs closely today.
ipa: jæ | hi kleɪmd ðət ə ˈθɝdˌpɑɹti ˈlaɪbɹɛɹi həd kɔzd ˌʌnɪkˈspɛktɪd bɪˈheɪvjɚ ˈʌndɚ haɪ loʊd | hi wɔɹnd ðət wi ʃəd ˈmɑnɪtɚ ðə lɔɡz ˈkloʊsli təˈdeɪ
stress: Yeah | he CLAIMED that a THIRD-PARTY LIBRARY had CAUSED UNEXPECTED BEHAVIOR under HIGH LOAD | he WARNED that we should MONITOR the LOGS CLOSELY TODAY

speaker: Ethan
text: That's serious. Did he ask for any specific actions from us?
ipa: ðæts ˈsɪɹiəs | dɪd i æsk fɚ ˈɛni spəˈsɪfɪk ˈækʃənz frəm ʌs
stress: That’s SERIOUS | did he ASK for ANY SPECIFIC ACTIONS from US
linking:
"did he" → /dɪd i/ (vowel link)
"ask for" → /æsk fɚ/ (k to for)

speaker: Sophia
text: He asked if we could help review the code changes straight away. He also wanted to know whether anyone had noticed similar issues in other services.
ipa: hi æskt ɪf wi kəd hɛlp ɹɪˈvju ðə koʊd ˈʧeɪnʤəz streɪt əˈweɪ | hi ˈɔlsoʊ ˈwɑntɪd tə noʊ ˈwɛðɚ ˈɛniˌwʌn həd ˈnoʊtɪst ˈsɪməlɚ ˈɪʃuz ɪn ˈʌðɚ ˈsɝvəsɪz
stress: He ASKED if we could HELP REVIEW the CODE CHANGES STRAIGHT AWAY | he ALSO WANTED to KNOW whether ANYONE had NOTICED SIMILAR ISSUES in OTHER SERVICES
linking:
"could help" → /kəd hɛlp/ (smooth link)
"straight away" → /streɪt əˈweɪ/ (t to a)

speaker: Sophia
text: I informed him that our microservices had been stable so far. But I agreed that it was a good idea to double-check everything this afternoon.
ipa: aɪ ɪnˈfɔɹmd ɪm ðət aʊɚ ˌmaɪkɹoʊˈsɝvəsɪz həd bɪn ˈsteɪbəl soʊ fɑɹ | bət aɪ əˈɡɹid ðət ɪt wəz ə ɡʊd aɪˈdiə tə ˈdʌbəl ʧɛk ˈɛvɹiˌθɪŋ ðɪs ˌæftɚˈnun
stress: I INFORMED him that our MICROSERVICES had been STABLE so FAR | but I AGREED that it was a GOOD IDEA to DOUBLE-CHECK EVERYTHING this AFTERNOON
linking:
"good idea" → /ɡʊd aɪˈdiə/ (d to vowel)
"double-check everything" → /ˈdʌbəl ʧɛk ˈɛvɹiˌθɪŋ/ (k + e)

speaker: Ethan
text: Did he mention anything about client impact?
ipa: dɪd i ˈmɛnʃən ˈɛniˌθɪŋ əˈbaʊt ˈklaɪənt ˈɪmpækt
stress: Did he MENTION anything about CLIENT IMPACT
linking:
"did he" → /dɪd i/ (vowel link)
"about client" → /əˈbaʊt ˈklaɪənt/ (t to c)

speaker: Sophia
text: He assured us that no customer had been affected because the backup servers had kicked in immediately.
ipa: hi əˈʃʊɹd əs ðət noʊ ˈkʌstəmɚ həd bɪn əˈfɛktɪd bɪˈkəz ðə ˈbækˌʌp ˈsɝvɚz həd kɪkt ɪn ɪˈmiːdiətli
stress: He ASSURED us that NO CUSTOMER had been AFFECTED because the BACKUP SERVERS had KICKED IN IMMEDIATELY

speaker: Ethan
text: That’s a relief. According to the operations team, they're planning to run extra load tests the following week.
ipa: ðæts ə ɹɪˈlif | əˈkɔɹdɪŋ tə ði ˌɑpəˈɹeɪʃənz tim | ðɛɹ ˈplænɪŋ tə ɹʌn ˈɛkstɹə loʊd tɛsts ðə ˈfɑloʊɪŋ wik
stress: That’s a RELIEF | according to the OPERATIONS TEAM | they're PLANNING to RUN EXTRA LOAD TESTS the FOLLOWING WEEK
linking:
"planning to" → /ˈplænɪŋ tə/ (to reduced)
"load tests" → /loʊd tɛsts/ (d to t)

speaker: Sophia
text: Yeah, and apparently the CTO suggested adding more redundancy to our architecture soon.
ipa: jæ | ənd əˈpɛɹəntli ðə ˌsiˌtiˈoʊ səɡˈʤɛstɪd ˈædɪŋ mɔɹ ɹɪˈdʌndənsi tə aʊɚ ˈɑɹkəˌtɛkʧɚ sun
stress: Yeah | and APPARENTLY the CTO SUGGESTED ADDING MORE REDUNDANCY to our ARCHITECTURE SOON
linking:
"adding more" → /ˈædɪŋ mɔɹ/ (ng to m)
"to our architecture" → /tə aʊɚ ˈɑɹkəˌtɛkʧɚ/ (to reduced)
